title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST/CLI API that lets you pull and run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally on macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, push models with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package giving chains, agents and retrieval pipelines native access to Ollama models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now renamed “Open WebUI”) with multi-user support, RAG, plugins.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama built on Retrofit; supports streaming, embeddings, custom options.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with syntax highlighting and history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like inline assistant.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run Retrieval-Augmented-Generation template using Ollama, ChromaDB and LangChain.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to chat with Ollama models inside the editor, with customizable prompts and streaming.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and persistent model storage.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated collection of Modelfiles for running custom fine-tunes and GGUF conversions.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Lightweight async Rust crate for Ollama REST API with serde models and streaming support.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client library for Ollama with chat, generate, embeddings and model management endpoints.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app that exposes Ollama as an async chat endpoint with user sessions and rate-limiting.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on your vault notes via Ollama with templating.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Python Slack Bolt bot that answers questions using any Ollama model in threaded replies.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot with group and private chat support, streaming replies and per-user model selection.
